member.summary: A WiFiRS21 module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.WiFiRS21.#ctor(System.Int32)

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.WiFiRS21.UseThisNetworkInterface

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.WiFiRS21.IsNetworkConnected
member.summary: Whether or not the the module is connected to a wireless network. Make sure to also check the NetworkUp property to verify network state.
